Assistant Manager, Human Resources Job at Electronic Payplus Limited




        
    

        
        Electronic Payplus Limited is a smartcard manufacturing company committed to delivering innovative solutions and exceptional service to our customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Manager, Human Resources

Job Location: Ibeju Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
As the Assistant Manager, Human Resources, you will:
     

            
    




	Recruitment & Selection: Assist in the full recruitment cycle, including sourcing candidates, conducting initial screening, and coordinating interviews.
	Onboarding: Develop and implement effective onboarding programs for new hires.
	Employee Relations: Handle employee inquiries, address concerns, and assist in resolving employee relations issues.
	Training & Development: Support the development and implementation of training programs to enhance employee skills and knowledge.
	Performance Management: Assist in the performance review process, including data analysis and reporting.
	HR Administration: Maintain employee records, ensure compliance with labour laws and regulations, and assist with HR-related projects.
	Employee Engagement: Contribute to initiatives that foster a positive and engaging work environment.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in human resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in human resources.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labour laws and regulations.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.
	Strong organizational and time-management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
	A proactive and results-oriented approach with a strong work ethic.
	Proven ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.
	Professional certifications such as CIPM, CIPD, SHRM or equivalent is compulsory to have.


Salary
N400,000 - N500,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a compelling cover letter to: recruitment@epayplusng.com using “Assistant Manager, Human Resources”  as the subject of the email.

Note: Interested candidates around Ibeju-Lekki and environs are encouraged to apply.

Showroom Manager Job at Bedmate Furniture Nigeria




        
    

        
        Bedmate Furniture, Nigeria's leading furniture company with a rich history spanning over two decades. Since our establishment in 2002, we have been dedicated to providing exceptional furniture solutions to homes, offices, and commercial spaces across the country.

As a socially responsible company, we strive to make a positive impact on our community and the environment. We adhere to sustainable practices, utilizing eco-friendly materials and minimizing waste in our production processes. Additionally, we actively engage in philanthropic initiatives, supporting local charities and organizations that promote education, healthcare, and social welfare. We have over 11 Showrooms all across Lagos, Abuja.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Showroom Manager

Job Location: Wuse / Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The showroom manager is the direct person in charge of the showroom.
	He/She is mainy responsible for the daily sales, showroom management, product management, staff management, organizatio, motivation, training and has overall responsibility for the management of the showroom.


Responsibilities
Sales Management:


	The sales manager will be reasonably formulate monthly, weekly and daily sales plans under the leadership of the regioanal Assistant Level A, to ensure the completion of sales target.
	The sales target is determined by the sales manager. Sales manager should ask sales representatives about the specific daily sales, and resolve issues in a timely manner, and provide necessary assistance and support, to ensure sales task is completely achieved.
	Break down the monthly sales target assigned by the company into weekly and daily sales, as well as allocating daily sales tasks to each sales person, ensuring everyone has a clear sales target.
	Memorize the company's product models and regional product sales "characteristics"
	Hold daily morning meetings, convey the company sales ploicy to the sales representatives and carry out review of previous day sales.
	Prepare showroom sales statistics on a weekly basis and check whether the weekly task is completed. Note the gap, existing problems and give suggestions for improvement.
	Sort out daily forms such as commission application / refund / special offer application forms, and timely submit them to Assistant Level A.
	Execute good daily after sales management of the showroom and resolve them in time If it cannot be resolved, report to the regional manager in time. Carry out daily showroom supervision and management (for example this will cover price tags / product hygiene / employee working conditions, etc.)
	Complete other tasks assigned by superior leaders.


Product Management:


	Carry out a good showroom product management (including new product / regular product quality feedback / showroom product retrieval / rationality of showroom product layout / store product inventory, etc.).
	Ensure regular feedback, collect information on regional competitors, and feedback information on related product.
	Regularly study and master information about new products from the company to ensure a comprehensive understanding of all products.
	Regularly check product inventory to ensure that stock is sufficient and orderly managed, avoiding stockouts or overstock and collect and analyze customer feedback on products, report to the company headquarters in a timely manner, and provide suggestions for improvement.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrmanager@bedmatefurniture.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Sales Representative Job at Bedmate Furniture Nigeria




        
    

        
        Bedmate Furniture, Nigeria's leading furniture company with a rich history spanning over two decades. Since our establishment in 2002, we have been dedicated to providing exceptional furniture solutions to homes, offices, and commercial spaces across the country. As a socially responsible company, we strive to make a positive impact on our community and the environment. We adhere to sustainable practices, utilizing eco-friendly materials and minimizing waste in our production processes. Additionally, we actively engage in philanthropic initiatives, supporting local charities and organizations that promote education, healthcare, and social welfare. We have over 11 Showrooms all across Lagos, Abuja

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Sales Representative

Job Location: Wuse / Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Ensure every pre-assigned sales target is met each month.
	Approach customers as they enter the showroom, inquire about the type of furniture they want, make suggestions and show them around
	Manage the sales process and close every sale with potential customers.
	Politely respond to questions/inquires raised by customers, conduct suggestive selling so as to move multiple products, process the paperwork and arrange financing when needed.
	Maintain accurate and up to date records of customers who do not make a purchase and follow up as needed.
	Maintain a clean and organized appearance of the showroom by regularly dusting and arranging displays, putting up any point-of-sale information and tags accurately
	Carry out physical inventory counts and assisting with orders.
	Constantly learn about new products and be able to explain specific features of various products to customers.
	Ensure maximum focus is given to excellent service and customer satisfaction.
	Process quotes and sales orders
	Assist in showroom set-up, design, and presentation of products
	Convert visitors into lifelong clients by being able to deliver timely follow-up, provide quality service, and ensure client satisfaction
	Explain different customizable features to customers and show them how to maximize their features.
	Discuss warranties and replacement of parts.
	Notify installers after closing a sales deal to collapse and package purchases.
	Represent and promote the organization’s products and services at events such as sales parties
	Conduct outbound lead follow-up calls to potential and existing customers via telephone and e-mail to sell products and services.
	Ensure pricing is correct and accurate.
	Notify sales supervisor of any after sales issues with customers
	Any other duties as assigned by ManagemenT


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND, HND, or First Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Finance, Social
	Minimum of 2 years of successful experience in sales
	Sciences or any other relevant discipline is required.
	Knowledge of commercial interiors and office furniture are considered a plus


Salary
N70,000 - N100,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrmanager@bedmatefurniture.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
